description: Retrieves details about a specific a maintenance window execution.

parameters.name: WindowExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution that includes the task.

nested_items.name: WindowExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution.

nested_items.name: TaskIds
nested_items.description: The ID of the task executions from the maintenance window execution.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the maintenance window execution.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: The details explaining the status. Not available for all status values.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the maintenance window started running.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time the maintenance window finished running.
